TopicTitle: The Alpaca: Friendly, simple SSTO transport.

Articles.Content:
Greetings, we are proud to present the Alpaca. This craft is an affordable, capable of transporting seven Kerbals to LKO and back again.

It has 80 units of monoprop, docking lights, a docking adapter, can make orbit with about 1000 m/s left.

9 intakes

960 liters of liquid fuel

880 units of oxidizer

Can Fly itself, has enough battery to go through the night.

Picture Gallery

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Now for some quotes from our satisfied customers!

OH GOD THE PAIN MY EYES JUST VAPORIZED ARGHHHHHHHHH

Bill Kerman, shortly before disintegration

Uh Jeb, Maybe we should stop taking such steep rerentry paths, I just saw Kevin being turned into a cloud of superheated plasma

Bob Kerman, on Jeb's choice of reentry pattern

Craft is availible here

That's cool about the self flying. llamatoes, does the Alpaca spit? And how often do you fleece it? Judging by your handle, you like these creatures from the Andes. Keep up the good work.
